title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-2.5 - Notice of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-2.5 - Notice of hearing

State Regulations

As promptly as possible after receipt of notification of
the need for a hearing, the commissioner will advise each party as to the date, time and place of the hearing and the procedures to be followed in selecting
the hearing panel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
82-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
